page.title: 07LEISURE ACTIVITIES.(2).
page.content: One lady told us that she plays with her little boy,and does not have many hobbies.A kennel owner breeds shepherd dogs and does not have any spare time. A lady in a cottage near Prested Hall told us that her husband is a gardener at the hall now.She likes gardening, sewing and reading.A man at Woodys farm cottages told us he goes to the pub in his spare time.He does not have many hobbies but he does any spare jobs on the farm.A lady at Popps is a dress maker and she likes gardening but does not have any spare time.A certain old lady who lives in Easthorpe likes playing her organ and also likes gardening,sewing and knitting.In addition she goes to help the church at harvest and also helps on the farm when the potatoes need to be harvested.
